item.title: Jessie add a quote by Amy Seidl
item.description: "The world is exploding in emerald, sage, and lusty chartreuse - neon green with so much yellow in it. It is an explosive green that, if one could watch it moment by moment throughout the day, would grow in every dimension." -- Amy Seidl

item.title: Jessie add a quote by Stefan Bechtel
item.description: "A man could shoot thirty ducks if it pleased him, and then shoot thirty more the next day, and it was perfectly legal. His hunting partner was likely to be the county sheriff." -- Stefan Bechtel

item.title: Jessie add a quote by Kate Bornstein
item.description: "Disney will never make a movie about my life story, and that's a shame--I'd make a really cute animated creature." -- Kate Bornstein

item.title: Jessie add a quote by Thomas Norman DeWolf
item.description: "We all inherit damage from the past. We spread it like a virus and don't generally think about it." -- Thomas Norman DeWolf

item.title: Jessie add a quote by Jeanne Theoharis
item.description: "When asked what gave her the strength and commitment to refuse segregation, (Rosa) Parks credited her mother and grandfather "for giving me the spirit of freedom... that I should not feel because of my race or color, inferior to any person. That I should do my very best to be a respectable person, to respect myself, to expect respect from others." -- Jeanne Theoharis
